description:
After Bobby found out his older brother Bradley did a film with us, he decided to come out and rub one off for us too. Boy, good looks must run in Bradley’s family. Bobby was gifted with the same beautiful eyes and lips that his brother has.
Bobby is the more reserved of the two brothers, but he maintains the same exhibitionist tendencies. He was so turned on and into his orgasm that he shot all over his chest, face, and lips!
title: Bobby
